The Taeglin was a river in Beleriand: It rose in the Ered Wethrin and flowed southeast through Brethil to join Sirion on the borders of Doriath. It had two minor tributaries: Celebros and Malduin.
The river could be forded at the Crossings of the Taeglin
near the western border of Brethil. A road ran through it from Nargothrond to Minas Tirith (Beleriand).
